---
title: Image 图像
---
### 基本用法
  可以通过 src 属性设置图像地址, 图像宽度默认为父容器宽度，图像高度等比例缩放

<br/>
<div style="width:400px;height:200px;background-color: #ccc;">
  <Image
    src="https://daisyui.com/images/stock/photo-1625726411847-8cbb60cc71e6.jpg"
  />
</div>
<div>
  <Image
    src="https://daisyui.com/images/stock/photo-1625726411847-8cbb60cc71e6.jpg"
  />
</div>
<br/>

```jsx
<div style="width:400px;height:200px;background-color: #ccc;">
  <Image
    src="https://daisyui.com/images/stock/photo-1625726411847-8cbb60cc71e6.jpg"
  />
</div>
<div>
  <Image
    src="https://daisyui.com/images/stock/photo-1625726411847-8cbb60cc71e6.jpg"
  />
</div>
```
### 设置图像的宽高以及宽高比
  可以通过 width 属性设置图像的宽度(<span class="text-red-600">只有当 layout属性为 fixed、contained、cover 时自定义 width 生效，其他值 width 为 100%</span>), height 属性设置图像的高度，或者 aspectRatio 设置宽高比。

<br/>
<div style="background-color: #ccc;">
  <Image
    width="200px"
    height="300px"
    layout="fixed"
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
  />
</div>
<br/>

```jsx
<div style="background-color: #ccc;">
  <Image
    width="200px"
    height="300px"
    layout="fixed"
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
  />
</div>
```
<div style="background-color: #ccc;">
  <Image
    width="200px"
    aspectRatio="2:1"
    layout="fixed"
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
  />
</div>
<br/>

```jsx
<div style="background-color: #ccc;">
  <Image
    width="200px"
    aspectRatio="2:1"
    layout="fixed"
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
  />
</div>
```
### 图像适应父容器的方式
  可以通过 layout 属性设置图像适应父容器的方式，可选项为 'fixed'、 'constrained'、 'fullWidth'、 'cover'、 'responsive'、 'contained'。

<br/>
##### fixed
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fixed"
  />
</div>
<div style="width:100%; height: 500px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fixed"
  />
</div>

```jsx
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fixed"
  />
</div>
<div style="width:100%; height: 500px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fixed"
  />
</div>

```

<br/>
##### constrained
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="constrained"
  />
</div>

  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="constrained"
  />
</div>
```jsx
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="constrained"
  />
</div>
<div style="width:100%; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="constrained"
  />
</div>

```

<br/>
##### fullWidth
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fullWidth"
  />
</div>

    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fullWidth"
  />
</div>
```jsx
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fullWidth"
  />
</div>
<div style="width:100%; height: auto; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">
  <Image
    src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01ifXUQI1u8qXD1Mkug_!!6000000005993-0-tps-460-460.jpg"
    layout="fullWidth"
  />
</div>

```

<div style="width:100%; height: auto; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">

  />
</div>

```jsx
  />

```

  />
</div>

```jsx
<div style="width:100%; height: auto; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">

    layout="responsive"
  />
</div>

```

##### contained
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">

```jsx
<div style="width:100%; height: 202px; background-color: #ccc; border: 1px solid #000; overflow: hidden;">

    layout="contained"
  />
</div>

```
### API
| 属性      | 说明                                                                                                                                    | 类型    | 默认值 |
| ---------| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- | ----------- |
| src      | 图像资源                                                                                                                                 | string &#124; ImageMetadata|  -  |
| width    | 图像宽度（只有当 layout属性为 fixed、contained、cover 时自定义 width 生效，其他值 width 为 100%）                                               | string &#124; number  |  - |
| height   | 图像高度                                                                                                                                 | string &#124; number  |  - |
| aspectRatio| 图像宽高比（设置 width 或者 height 时生效）                                                                                               | string &#124; number  |  - |
| style    | 图像自定义样式                                                                                                                            | string  |  -    |
| alt      | 图像加载错误时的文本                                                                                                                       | string   |  ''    |
| layout   | 图像适应父容器的方式<br/><strong>可选值:</strong><br/>'fixed'、 'constrained'、 'fullWidth'、 'cover'、 'responsive'、 'contained'            | Enum    |  -    |
| fetchpriority| 获取图像时的相对的优先级 <br/><strong>可选值:</strong><br/> 'high'、 'low'、 'auto'                                                       | Enum  |  auto   |
| loading| 指示浏览器应当如何加载该图像 <br/><strong>可选值:</strong><br/> 'eager'、 'lazy'                                                                | Enum  |  eager  |
| decoding| 设置当前图像解码方式 <br/><strong>可选值:</strong><br/> 'sync'、 'async'、 'auto'                                                   | Enum  |  auto  |
